meanings.sent1: She packed her favorite leisurewear for the weekend getaway.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing casual clothing for relaxation.
meanings.sent1: After work, she changed into her leisurewear to unwind on the couch.
meanings.sent2: On lazy Sundays, he enjoyed the simple pleasure of leisurewear all day.
meanings.sent3: The idea of wearing leisurewear to a fancy dinner party made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her leisurewear was like a shield, protecting her from the stress of the day.
meanings.sent5: The comfort of her leisurewear was a gentle reminder to slow down and relax.
